name: Happy Tree Harvest
description:
Welcome to Happy Tree Town! It's the Harvest Season, time to find some food!

Winter will be hard my dear, please help us survive this year.

Controls:

  • <Space> to advance dialogue, and perform some interactions
  • <WASD> or <Arrow Buttons> to move.

There are 8 different endings in this game, may your heart guide you!

  • (NOTE: the scoresheet at the end of each year is NOT the end of the game!)

Credits:

Everything made by Sakura Magika, except the following sounds:

  • inchadney - Howling Wind
    • https://freesound.org/people/inchadney/sounds/157204/
  • BenDrain - Tractor_Drive_06.wav
    • https://freesound.org/people/BenDrain/sounds/488008/
